root.name: AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAa!!! for the Awesome
root.description: OverviewJump down and avoid obstacles and pass checkpoints in this semi-sequel of the game with the weirdest name in town. This time you basejump on earth and in space in 82 remastered levels from the original and 43 new levels.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: Dual CoreMemory: 1GBHard Disk Space: 2GBVideo Card: 3D card with 512MBDirectXÂ®: 9.0c+Mac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: Dual CoreMemory: 1GBHard Disk Space: 2GBVideo Card: 3D card with 512MB
